newsitem.title: CHINA: Engelhard mulls China catalyst venture-report.
newsitem.headline: Engelhard mulls China catalyst venture-report.

text.p: Engelhard Corp is discussing a possible joint venture with China Petrochemical Corp to produce chemical catalysts used in refining, the Business Weekly said on Sunday.
State run refiner China Petrochemical Corp, known as Sinopec, has three catalyst producers but is in need of upgrading its technology, the newspaper said.
Sinopec produces much of the petrol refined in China and owns 10,000 of the nation's 82,000 petrol stations, state media has said.
Engelhard also opened a representative office in Beijing last week, the newspaper said.
